text: Francisco de Zamudio y Avendaño, O.S.A. (7 January 1570 – 27 April 1639) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Nueva Caceres (1628–1639). (in Latin) ==Biography== Francisco de Zamudio y Avendaño was born in Portilla on 7 January 1570 and ordained a priest in the Order of Saint Augustine. On 10 July 1628, he was appointed during the papacy of Pope Urban VIII as Bishop of Nueva Caceres. On 29 June 1629, he was consecrated bishop. He served as Bishop of Nueva Caceres until his death on 10 July 1628. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:17th-century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Urban VIII Category:1570 births Category:1639 deaths Category:Augustinian bishops Category:People from the Province of Cuenca Category:Roman Catholic bishops in the Philippines
title: Francisco de Zamudio y Avendaño
